name: CW_ABST_PD_ADEQUACY
description: Peritoneal dialysis adequacy information from abstractions with clinical peritoneal dialysis or other dialysis information reported to the United States ESRD patient registry.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: PD_KTV_VALUE
columns.description: The patient's peritoneal dialysis treatment Kt/V value.

columns.name: PD_KTV_DATE
columns.description: The patient's peritoneal dialysis treatment Kt/V collection date.

columns.name: PD_KTV_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's treatment Kt/V calculation method.

columns.name: PD_BSA_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's body surface area calculation method.

columns.name: PD_RRF_ASSESSED_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the peritoneal dialysis patient's residual renal function was assessed in calculating Kt/V or not.

columns.name: PD_URINE_VOLUME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's urine volume value used in Kt/V calculation.

columns.name: PD_HEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's height unit.

columns.name: PD_WEIGHT_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's weight unit.

columns.name: PD_KTV_BSA_IS_CORRECTED_YN
columns.description: Shows whether the peritoneal dialysis patient's creatinine clearance lab value uses corrected BSA or not.

columns.name: PD_KTV_CREATININE_VALUE
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's serum creatinine lab value.

columns.name: PD_KTV_CREATININE_DATE
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's serum creatinine lab collection date.

columns.name: PD_KTV_NPCR_VALUE
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's Normalized Protein Catabolic Rate (nPCR) value.

columns.name: PD_KTV_NPCR_DATE
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's Normalized Protein Catabolic Rate (nPCR) collection date.

columns.name: PD_KTV_CREATININE_CLEAR_VALUE
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's creatinine clearance value.

columns.name: PD_KTV_CREATININE_CLEAR_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The peritoneal dialysis patient's creatinine clearance unit of measurement.
